name: xing-lv-music-player
description: 星旅音乐播放器：一款现代星际主题的唱片音乐播放器，带有音频可视化功能，专为内容创作者录制音乐而设计。
author: Because66666

scripts.dev:electron: powershell -NoProfile -Command "$env:NODE_ENV='development'; Start-Process -NoNewWindow -FilePath 'cmd.exe' -ArgumentList '/c','npm run dev:vite'; npx wait-on http://localhost:3000; npx electron ."
scripts.start:electron: powershell -NoProfile -Command "$env:ELECTRON_IS_DEV=0; $env:NODE_ENV='production'; npm run build; npx electron ."
scripts.build:win: powershell -NoProfile -Command "$ErrorActionPreference='SilentlyContinue'; foreach($n in @('electron','Xing lv music player','Xing lv music player Setup')) { Get-Process -Name $n -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Stop-Process -Force }; Start-Sleep -Seconds 1; Remove-Item -Recurse -Force 'release\win-unpacked' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; npm run prebuild:win; npm run build; electron-builder --win --x64"
